# OBJECT::SET_IS_OBJECT_BALL

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** isBall

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether an object is going to be used as a ball
